00003 #ifndef _ORNPLpCMeterDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORNPLpCMeterDecoder_hh_
00005 
00006 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 
00008 class ORNPLpCMeterDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00009 {
00010   public: 
00011     ORNPLpCMeterDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORNPLpCMeterDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     enum ENPLpCMeterDecoderConsts { kHeaderSize = 2 };
00015 
00016     inline UShort_t DeviceNumberOf( UInt_t* record )
00017       { return record[1] & 0xF; } 
00018 
00019     inline UInt_t UnixTimeOf( UInt_t* record )
00020       { return record[2]; }
00021 
00022     inline UShort_t IDCounterOf( UInt_t* record, size_t iRow )
00023       { return ( record[3 + iRow] & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24; } 
00024 
00025     inline UShort_t IsSignalOf( UInt_t* record, size_t iRow )
00026       { return ( record[3 + iRow] & 0x00800000 ) >> 23; } 
00027 
00028     inline UShort_t ChannelOf( UInt_t* record, size_t iRow )
00029       { return ( record[3 + iRow] & 0x00600000 ) >> 21; } 
00030 
00031     inline UShort_t AOrBOf( UInt_t* record, size_t iRow )
00032       { return ( record[3 + iRow] & 0x00100000 ) >> 20; } 
00033 
00034     inline UInt_t DataOf( UInt_t* record, size_t iRow )
00035       { return ( record[3 + iRow] & 0x000FFFFF ); } 
00036 
00037     inline UInt_t NumberDataRecordsOf( UInt_t* record )
00038       { return ( LengthOf(record) - kHeaderSize - 1);  }
00039 
00040 
00041     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 9; }
00042     virtual std::string GetParName( size_t iPar );
00043     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00044     virtual size_t GetNRows( UInt_t* record ) 
00045       { return NumberDataRecordsOf( record ); }
00046 
00047     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() 
00048       { return "NplpCMeter:NplpCMeter"; }
00049 };
00050 
00051 #endif
